QuestData.Title: Oralius' Adventure
QuestData.Description: Me n' Winky, off on adventures again! This is the life, I tell ye. No burning air to breathe, an' plenty of ogres to kill!$B$B<Oralius rubs his belly.>$B$BWe did leave a bit of a mess back there in the Blackrock Spire, though. A whole mess of these iron-plated orcs and some proto-dragons marched right on up from the south and took it over.$B$BOl' Winky, he couldn't take the guilt. Went on back by himself he did, to stop them!$B$BOr... to JOIN them! Winky, ye two-timing son of an orc. Ye've got to stop him!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Spire Flamefly in Upper Blackrock Spire.
